transcript:
there is a measure of power and control
that is predicated on the continuance of
victim status and so unsurprisingly we
often see resistance to letting go of
past wrongs in a relationship because
doing so means simultaneously letting go
of the Privileges that accrue to
occupying a position of victimhood
the fact is that if conditions are met
the transgressed party needs to be
willing to forgive the other person
completely and that means that he or she
does not get to bring it up again in a
fight years later after the fact that is
an emotional manipulation strategy
designed to secure leverage in a
relationship and it's toxic
